regulation.title: Proposed Rule on Automated Valuation Models
regulation.agency: CFPB, OCC, FDIC, NCUA, FHFA, FRB
regulation.summary: Interagency rule implementing quality control standards for automated valuation models (AVMs) used in mortgage lending decisions. Requires institutions to adopt policies ensuring AVMs are accurate, protect against data manipulation, avoid conflicts of interest, undergo random sample testing, and comply with nondiscrimination laws. Applies to all first-lien residential mortgage loans.

institution_context.name: Navy Federal Credit Union
institution_context.current_avm_usage: Used for HELOCs, home equity loans, and some refinancing
